readme:
# Whisper STT Microservice

Real-time STT using Faster-Whisper for Brazilian Portuguese.

## Endpoints

- WebSocket: `ws://<pod-url>/ws/stt`
- Health: `GET /health/ready`
- Status: `GET /health/status`
- Metrics: `GET /metrics`

## Model Options

Set `STT_WHISPER_MODEL` to:
- `distil-whisper-large-v3` (default, fast)
- `large-v3` (best quality)
- `medium` (balanced)

## Quick Test

Use the Python client or curl:

```bash
curl http://<pod-url>/health/ready
```
